flavorText: "Who can deny the call to battle when it sings in our blood?"

foreignData.flavorText: „Wer von uns sollte sich schon dem Ruf zu den Waffen entziehen können? Der Kampf liegt uns im Blut."
foreignData.name: Plünderer der Pheres-Herde
foreignData.text: Inspiriert — Immer wenn die Plünderer der Pheres-Herde enttappt werden, kannst du {2}{G} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, bringe einen 3/3 grünen Zentaur-Verzauberungskreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Quién puede resistirse a la llamada de la batalla cuando burbujea en la sangre?".
foreignData.name: Incursores del clan Feres
foreignData.text: Inspiración — Siempre que los Incursores del clan Feres se enderecen, puedes pagar {2}{G}. Si lo haces, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura encantamiento Centauro verde 3/3.

foreignData.flavorText: « Qui peut ignorer l'appel du combat quand il court dans nos veines ? »
foreignData.name: Pillards du clan Phérès
foreignData.text: Inspiration — À chaque fois que les Pillards du clan Phérès deviennent dégagés, vous pouvez payer {2}{G}. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature-enchantement 3/3 verte Centaure.

foreignData.flavorText: "Chi potrebbe ignorare la chiamata alle armi quando essa canta nel nostro sangue?"
foreignData.name: Razziatori della Banda Feres
foreignData.text: Ispirazione — Ogniqualvolta i Razziatori della Banda Feres vengono STAPpati, puoi pagare {2}{G}. Se lo fai, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura incantesimo Centauro 3/3 verde.

foreignData.flavorText: 「血が騒ぐのに、戦いへの招集を拒否することができる者がいるか？」
foreignData.name: フィーリーズ団の略奪者
foreignData.text: 神啓 ― フィーリーズ団の略奪者がアンタップ状態になるたび、あなたは{2}{G}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、緑の３/３のケンタウルス・クリーチャー・エンチャント・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ケンタウルス・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: "우리 핏속에 울려 퍼지는 전장의 부름을 누가 거부할 수 있겠는가?"
foreignData.name: 피레스 무리 약탈자들
foreignData.text: 영감 — 피레스 무리 약탈자들이 언탭될 때마다, 당신은 {2}{G}를 지불할 수 있다. 당신이 그렇게 한다면, 3/3 녹색 켄타우로스 부여마법 생물 토큰 하나를 전장에 놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Quem pode ignorar o clamor da batalha quando ele soa em seu próprio sangue?"
foreignData.name: Salteadores do Bando Feres
foreignData.text: Inspirado — Toda vez que Salteadores do Bando Feres se torna desvirado, você pode pagar {2}{G}. Se fizer isso, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura encantamento verde 3/3 do tipo Centauro.

foreignData.flavorText: «Как можно не откликнуться на зов в битву, когда он звучит в нашей крови?»
foreignData.name: Налетчики Племени Ферий
foreignData.text: Одухотворение — Каждый раз, когда Налетчики Племени Ферий становятся развернутыми, вы можете заплатить {2}{G}. Если вы это делаете, положите на поле битвы одну фишку чар существа 3/3 зеленый Кентавр.

foreignData.flavorText: 「当我们的血液高唱战歌时，谁能拒绝战嚎的呼唤？」
foreignData.name: 斐力兹族突击队
foreignData.text: 启悟～每当斐力兹族突击队成为未横置时，你可以支付{2}{G}。若你如此作，则将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生结界生物放进战场。

foreignData.flavorText: 「當我們的血液高唱戰歌時，誰能拒絕戰嚎的呼喚？」
foreignData.name: 斐力茲族突擊隊
foreignData.text: 啟悟～每當斐力茲族突擊隊成為未橫置時，你可以支付{2}{G}。若你如此作，則將一個3/3綠色半人馬衍生結界生物放進戰場。

name: Pheres-Band Raiders
originalText: Inspired — Whenever Pheres-Band Raiders becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, put a 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Inspired abilities trigger no matter how the creature becomes untapped: by the turn-based action at the beginning of the untap step or by a spell or ability.

If an inspired ability triggers during your untap step, the ability will be put on the stack at the beginning of your upkeep. If the ability creates one or more token creatures, those creatures won’t be able to attack that turn (unless they gain haste).
Inspired abilities don’t trigger when the creature enters the battlefield.
If the inspired ability includes an optional cost, you decide whether to pay that cost as the ability resolves. You can do this even if the creature leaves the battlefield in response to the ability.

text: Inspired — Whenever Pheres-Band Raiders becomes untapped, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, create a 3/3 green Centaur enchantment creature token.
